Shopify Hero Slider Section

Learn how to create a Hero Slider section with Sections Pro in Shopify

Description of the Section

The Hero Slider is an engaging, full-width carousel that takes center stage on your Shopify store's homepage or any designated page. This section brings dynamic visuals to your site, allowing you to highlight multiple products, collections, or promotional content in a slideshow format. The Hero Slider includes customizable text, buttons, and background options, ensuring it fits seamlessly with your store's branding.

Demo of the Section

Installation Instructions

  1. Download the Sections Pro app on the Shopify App Store
  2. Open the app and navigate to Free Sections
  3. Search for "Hero Slider"
  4. Click to Publish or Purchase

Sample Use Cases for a Shopify E-commerce Store

  1. Product Promotions: Showcase your best-selling products or new arrivals prominently on your homepage, encouraging visitors to explore.
  2. Seasonal Campaigns: Create eye-catching slides that promote seasonal sales, holiday collections, and special discounts.
  3. Brand Storytelling: Use the slider to tell your brand's story with compelling visuals and text, enhancing customer engagement.
  4. Customer Testimonials: Highlight positive customer feedback and reviews in a visually appealing format to build trust and credibility.
  5. Event Announcements: Promote upcoming events, webinars, or special live sessions with informative and attractive slides.

Overview of the Configuration Settings

The Hero Slider section comes with a wide range of configuration settings, making it versatile and adaptable to your needs:

  • Text Settings:

    • Text Font: Choose from various fonts for your text.
    • Text Size: Adjustable from 10px to 50px.
    • Headline Font: Select the font for your headlines.
    • Headline Size: Adjustable from 10px to 100px.

  • Color Settings:

    • Background Color: Option to set a gradient or solid color background.
    • Text Color: Customize the color of your text.
    • Progress Background Color: Set the background color for progress elements.
    • Progress Foreground Color: Set the foreground color for progress elements.
    • Indicator Color: Color for the slider indicators.
    • Cover Background: Set a background overlay with adjustable opacity.

  • Content Settings:

    • Margin and Padding: Configure the margin and padding for captions.
    • Caption Background Color: Choose a background color for the caption.
    • Show Glass Effect: Option to add a glass effect to the caption.

  • Button Style:

    • Padding: Set the padding for the top/bottom and left/right of the button.
    • Border Radius: Customize the rounded corners of the button.
    • Button Background Color: Set a gradient or solid color background for the button.
    • Button Text Color: Customize the text color of the button.

  • Dimensions:

    • Max Width: Specify the maximum width of the section.
    • Padding: Configure padding for the top, bottom, left, and right.
    • Element Spacing: Set spacing between text elements.

  • Slideshow Settings:

    • Text Shadow: Add a subtle shadow to text.
    • Media Radius: Round the borders of media elements.
    • Media Shadow: Apply a subtle shadow to media elements.
    • Media Aspect Ratio: Choose from various aspect ratios for desktop and mobile.
    • Image Width: Set the image width requested from Shopify for desktop and mobile.
    • Autoplay: Enable or disable autoplay and set the autoplay time duration.
